articles.description: From the Safdies-produced 'Ren Faire' to Jake Gyllenhaal's 'Road House,' here are 23 movies and shows to watch for at SXSW 2024.
articles.content: This year’s SXSW Film and TV Festival (running March 8 through March 16) continues the Austin-based multimedia showcases expansion beyond typical-screen movies and into the realms of TV and XR experi… [+22492 chars]

articles.title: Dave Grohl Had the Time of His Life at U2's Sphere Concert - Consequence
articles.description: Dave Grohl was seen swaying, shimmying, fist-pumping, and screaming the words to U2's "Beautiful Day" during their final show at The Sphere.
articles.content: Dave Grohl loves many things: his band, the drums, his family, feeding the homeless. But one thing he loves arguably more than all these things is a damn good rock show, which — judging by his reacti… [+1788 chars]
